requirement_en: Apply security procedures upon employment termination
requirement_ar: تطبيق إجراءات أمنية عند إنهاء الخدمة
implementation_guidance_en: Disable access immediately upon termination. Retrieve assets. Conduct exit interview covering confidentiality. Document completion.
evidence_requirements: Offboarding checklist|Access revocation log|Asset return forms

requirement_en: Obtain confidentiality agreements from employees and contractors
requirement_ar: الحصول على اتفاقيات سرية من الموظفين والمقاولين
implementation_guidance_en: Require signed NDAs before access to sensitive information. Renew for contractors annually. Include in onboarding package.
evidence_requirements: NDA templates|Signed NDAs|Renewal tracking

requirement_en: Document and diagram complete network environment
implementation_guidance_en: Create and maintain network topology diagrams. Document VLANs subnets and security zones. Update after changes.
evidence_requirements: Network diagrams|IP address allocation|VLAN documentation

requirement_en: Segregate networks based on sensitivity and function
implementation_guidance_en: Implement VLANs or physical separation. Isolate critical systems. Separate user and server networks. Use DMZ for internet-facing systems.
evidence_requirements: Segregation diagram|VLAN configuration|Firewall rules

requirement_en: Test all changes in non-production environment
requirement_ar: اختبار جميع التغييرات في بيئة غير إنتاجية
implementation_guidance_en: Maintain separate dev/test/staging environments. Require successful testing before production deployment. Document test results.
evidence_requirements: Test environment specifications|Test results|Deployment records

implementation_guidance_en: Follow OWASP Top 10. Conduct security testing. Deploy Web Application Firewall (WAF). Fix vulnerabilities before production.
evidence_requirements: Secure development practices|Penetration test reports|WAF configuration
